Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that President Trump wants to deport American Indians to India. The story is fabricated and falsely quotes Trump.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that Trump wants to deport American Indians to India, when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a fake news story from a questionable source.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the fake news story is true and presents it as a fact.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the fake news story was created to spread misinformation and create controversy.
